      • RPCClient

        public RPCClient(URI server,
                 String rpcuser,
                 String rpcpassword)
        Parameters:
        server - server URI should not contain username/password
        rpcuser - username for the RPC HTTP connection
        rpcpassword - password for the RPC HTTP connection

    • Method Detail

      • getServerURI

        public URI getServerURI()

      • send

        protected <T> T send(String method,
                     List<Object> params)
              throws IOException,
                     JsonRPCStatusException

        JSON-RPC remote method call that returns the 'result'

        Parameters:
        method - JSON RPC method call to send
        params - JSON RPC params
        <T> - Expected return type — will match type of variable method result is assigned to
        Returns:
        the 'result' field of the JSON RPC response
        Throws:
        IOException
        JsonRPCStatusException

      • cliSend

        public Object cliSend(String method,
                      Object... params)
               throws IOException,
                      JsonRPCException

        CLI-style send

        Useful for: * Simple (not client-side validated) command line utilities * Functional tests that need to send incorrect types to the server to test error handling

        Parameters:
        method - Allows RPC method to be passed as a stream
        params - variable number of untyped objects
        Returns:
        The 'result' element from the returned JSON RPC response
        Throws:
        IOException
        JsonRPCException

      • createParamList

        protected List<Object> createParamList(Object... parameters)

        Create a mutable param list (so send() can remove null parameters)

        Parameters:
        parameters - A variable number of parameters as varargs or array
        Returns:
        A mutable list of the same parameters
